personal.name: Vijay Reddy
personal.title: Frontend Developer
personal.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm a passionate frontend developer who creates beautiful, responsive web experiences.
personal.about: I'm a creative frontend developer with 3+ years of experience building modern web applications. I specialize in React, TypeScript, and creating pixel-perfect user interfaces that provide exceptional user experiences.

experience.description: Lead frontend development for multiple client projects, mentoring junior developers and implementing modern React applications with TypeScript.
Developed responsive web applications and collaborated with designers to create pixel-perfect implementations.
Built user interfaces for web applications and gained experience with modern frontend frameworks and tools.

projects.title: E-Commerce Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive admin dashboard for managing e-commerce operations with real-time analytics and inventory management.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A beautiful weather application with location-based forecasts, animated icons, and responsive design.

projects.title: Task Management Tool
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with drag-and-drop functionality and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects and skills with smooth animations and clean design.
